𒌋 veet ו את 𓍢

𓎛 𓈖𓂝 #hna ḫna con hand > and (𓂝𓂝⇔𓂞) 𐏃𐎭𐎠 h-d-a /hadā/ with

AD5 𒌑𒄉 add & v'et with

𐀃-𐀅 o-da with, et & ( vs 𐀃-𐀄 ohne )
𐀃-𐀅-𐁌-𐀲 o-da-twe-ta with tooth
𐀃-𐀅-𐀃 o-da-o and also, with, too
𐀃-𐀅-𐁀 o-da-a and/oder ⇔ weder 𐀃-𐀄-𐀤 o-u-qe neither

In Egyptian only the 'reflection' of with is attested:

𓅓 mit | tom to'im 𓅓 con 𓎛 𓈖 𓂝

𒀉𒋾 ʷit-ti with, vice-versa, at, from 𒀉 𒋫𒀠𒄰 ʷit-ta-al-kam come with mitkomm-
